Trade/Device Name(s): KeyPath MRSA/MSSA Blood Culture Test - BT
Specimen Container(s): BD BACTEC blood culture bottles (Plus Aerobic/F and Plus Anaerobic/F)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): KeyPath MRSA/MSSA Blood Culture Test BT
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for KeyPath MRSA/MSSA Blood Culture Test BT for qualitative identification and susceptibility of S. aureus from positive blood cultures using bacteriophage amplification and immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for timely identification of S. aureus and determination of methicillin susceptibility (MSSA) or resistance (MRSA) directly from positive blood cultures, using bacteriophage amplification and cefoxitin, as an aid in detection in conjunction with other laboratory and clinical data.
